location_id,location_name,location_lat,location_lon,expect_error,expect_error,comment
loc1,Flex Zone A,37.7749,-122.4194,,Valid location with coordinates
missing_id,,Valid Zone Name,37.7749,-122.4194,RequiredFieldError:location_id,location_id is required
